description: Title page: al-Mukhtaṣar al-kabīr min sīrat sayyidinā Rasūl Allāh. ff. 55. 187 x 144; 145 x 103 mm. 17 lin. Ṣafar 791, ʻAlī ibn ḥasan ibn ʻAlī al-Subkī. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 86 (4: no. 1); S II, 78. Ms. Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi Kütüphanesi Arapc̦a yazmalar kataloğu, 6028 has title al-Mukhtaṣar al-ṣaghīr fī sīrat al-bashīr al-nadhīr. Incip. : ... الحمد لله حمدا ىوافى جزىل نعمائه ... اما بعد فهذا مختصر
author: Ibn Jamāʻah, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad, 1294-1366
creator: Ibn Jamāʻah, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad, 1294-1366
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Biography—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
